CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial
JUDGES: Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Stanislav Shevchuk;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the city of GPE , GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded the applicant CARDINAL NORP hryvnyas ( ORG ) against the ORG - owned ORG mine in compensation for her husband ’s death as a result of a work - related accident . Subsequently , the mine was reorganised into ORG .
CARDINAL . The judgment was not appealed against , became final , and enforcement proceedings were instituted to collect the debt .
CARDINAL . DATE and DATE the applicant was paid ORG CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant received the rest of the judgment debt .
CARDINAL . The applicant attempted to collect compensation from the debtor company for the delay in enforcement , by way of judicial proceedings ; however her efforts were to no avail .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgments of ORG v. GPE , no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE , and PERSON v. GPE , no . GPE , § § CARDINAL , DATE .
